channel.title: [PI/DSPK] PkPoint Shop GLITCH - HELP!
channel.description: Is there any way I can get the items in the shop to sell for 100 PkPoints but sell to the general store for 25m GP? I edited prices in prices.txt and it screwed up the shop. PLEASE HELP? Or is there any way to change the amount of PkPoints you get per kill?

item.title: [PI/DSPK] PkPoint Shop GLITCH - HELP!
item.dc:creator: @_Bro [Bro]
item.description:
@_Bro wrote:

Is there any way I can get the items in the shop to sell for 100 PkPoints but sell to the general store for 25m GP? I edited prices in prices.txt and it screwed up the shop. PLEASE HELP? Or is there any way to change the amount of PkPoints you get per kill?
